channel.title: Mad Eye on BRYSGO
channel.description: Recent content in Mad Eye on BRYSGO

item.title: Wishlist: Coding in the Cloud (without falling from the sky)
item.description: As a diehard Google fanboy, it is my duty to figure out how I can switch to a Chromebook as my primary laptop. The only way I can see myself doing that is if I were provided a web based programming experience that was better than coding on metal. Enter Bryan’s fantasy world, where a flourishing space economy affords us with cheap vacations to the moon and once a year visits to grandma on the mars colony.
